snippet: A man arrested last year for allegedly planning to detonate pipe bombs in New York City has been indicted on terrorism charges, and could face life in prison if convicted.
abstract: Jose Pimentel, arrested in 2011 for allegedly planning to detonate pipe bombs in New York City, is indicted on terrorism charges, and could face life in prison if convicted.
lead_paragraph: A man arrested last year for allegedly planning to detonate pipe bombs in New York City has been indicted on terrorism charges, and could face life in prison if convicted.

headline.seo: Manhattan Man Charged in Terror Case Is Indicted
headline.main: Manhattan Man Indicted in Pipe Bomb Case
headline.print_headline: Manhattan Man Indicted in Pipe Bomb Case
